name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer Software with 8 years of experience, I excel in **C#** development and **agile** methodologies, focusing on **system architecture** and **performance optimization** for high-performance applications. My technical proficiency includes **CI/CD** practices encompassing automation and code reviews to ensure code quality and efficiency in software development.
I have a proven track record in full-stack development, utilizing modern frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, while also leveraging **Python** in backend services with technologies such as **Django** and **FastAPI**. My expertise extends to cloud platforms, specifically **AWS** and **Azure**, which I utilize for deploying scalable applications that adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
I also possess hands-on experience in elite technical areas such as microservices architecture and real-time data processing, allowing me to build secure, robust applications. I am adept at integrating AI/ML capabilities into enterprise-grade platforms, fostering intelligent automation and predictive analytics. Additionally, I have developed machine learning pipelines with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring smooth deployment and monitoring of ML models in production environments.
